content: The cat tote bag is the purrrfect accessory for the crazy cat lady who wants to stay fashionable. This ultra practical tote bag features two cell phone pockets, 3D printed ears and an adorable two sided cat face design that keeps you company anywhere you go.

Hello Kitty is back and she’s ready to party mile high. The Hello Kitty glass pipe is handmade in the likeness of your favorite Japanese character, and comes with a special glow in the dark feature that transforms the pipe into a functional glow stick while in use.

titleEN: Canned Air From Around The World
content: Stop wasting money on expensive travel expenses – now you can experience the world simply by opening one of these cans of air from around the world. With everything from New York to Paris, these cans are must haves for the country hopper on a budget.

Fight against your scatterbrain tendencies with the essentials reminder doormat. This helpful doormat displays a list of the three essential items you shouldn’t leave home without so that if you happen to  forget them, the doormat will remind you about it before you walk out.

Can you name the truck with four wheel drive – smells like a steak and seats thirty-five. Canyonero! Canyonero! 12 yards long, 2 lanes wide, 65 tons of American Pride! Top of the line in utility sports, unexplained fires are a matter for the courts! Canyonero! Canyoneroooooooo!

Add a little extra suspense to your thriller novel by saving your reading place with the dead guy bookmark. This creative bookmark is handmade with extreme attention to detail to resemble a corpse from the morgue, and it even includes a tiny toe tag for added authenticity.

The modern cuckoo clock incorporates an old school element into your home’s decorum without sacrificing the room’s contemporary look. The elegant wooden exterior is styled in a minimalist fashion and can be programmed for specific times with adjustable volumes.

Strap into your four wheeled land ship like a true Star Wars fan with the Chewbacca seat belt cover. This fur covered cover is designed to make you look like Chewy. It’s not only stylish, but it’s easy to place over the seat belt and increases the comfort level when buckling up.

Cleanse yourself with arguably one of the greatest games of all time with the Legend Of Zelda: Ocarina Of Time gold plated cartridge soap bar. With a lovely “enchanted woods” scent, this incredibly detailed soap bar is a must have for Zelda fans.

Transform your puny human legs into the high tech limbs you’ve always dreamed of with the bionic leggings. The detailed design covers the entire leggings to make your legs appear like indestructible limbs designed in a secret laboratory at an undisclosed location.

Stay classy while at school or work with help from the engraved Anchor Man quote pencils. Each pencil comes engraved with one of Ron’s classic catch phrases like “Son of a bee sting” or “I’m kind of a big deal” to make the day just a tad bit more glorious.

Upgrade your appearance and attract all the geeks with the comic book sound effects headband. With embroidered action words like BAM, KABOOM, and WHAM, these custom made head bands make the ultimate geeky accessory for any comic fangirl.

Serve up some distinguished gentlemanly treats by preparing a batch with the mustache cookie cutter. This novelty cookie cutter is made from durable food safe plastic, comes in five distinct styles and works for making all sorts of mustache-shaped treats.

Add to your burgeoning collection of Whovian gear with the Doctor Who TARDIS Kindle cover. This novel cover offers your Kindle maximum protection from falls and scratches while pleasing the ocular senses with a detailed rendering of the Doctor’s TARDIS.

With the pug purse, dog lovers will be able to carry their quirky companion with them wherever they go. These custom purses offer ample room for possessions, and can be decorated with a custom high quality image of your furry friend emblazoned on the purse.

Show friends and loved ones just how much they mean to you by immortalizing their likeness with the laser cut wood pictures. These wooden portraits are the elegant and unique way to preserve a fond memory in a warm and rustic manner.

Use the Zelda NES cartridge clock to keep track of how many hours you’ve wasted away like a true gamer. This retro clock is a must have for any old school Legend Of Zelda fan, as this nostalgic clock is built using an old school NES cartridge as body.

Let it all hang out and give any curious male onlookers the weirdest boner right now with the visible uterus underwear. This mostly anatomically correct underwear displays the uterus in all its glory, allowing the exhibitionist in you to go wild while not actually getting naked.

Restore your HP after an intense gaming session with some 8-bit Zelda themed snacks created with this geeky cookie cutter. Simply mix the cookie dough with an excessive amount of sugar, apply the cookie cutter, set it in the oven, and you’ll have sugary treats in no time.

As the Star Wars Death Star grinder demonstrates, the capabilities of this space station go far beyond turning planets to dust. This hand crafted grinder contains a quality metal core designed to grind almost any herb with ease.

Let your children’s drawings come to life with these custom made stuffed animals. Ditch the mass produced garbage at the toy store and reward their creativity by having their drawings turned into hand made stuffed animals that will be their new favorite toy.

Whether your aim is to look fabulous or break into a home, the lock pick earrings are the fashion accessories you need. These elegant stainless steel earrings include everything you need to get in and out without being noticed. No one will suspect a thing.

With the Harry Potter plush pillow you’ll be able to cuddle up with your favorite Hogwart’s alum whenever you’re in need of some company. This custom made plush features Harry’s trademark round spectacles, lighting shaped scarf, and Gryffindor scarf.

Entertain bystanders with some enjoyable background music with the playable harmonica USB drive. This device offers 8 GB of storage capacity in addition to a highly portable instrument you can use to create beautiful melodies – provided you have talent.

Deck the halls with boughs of blood and gore when you decorate with the zombie Santa ornament. As this gruesomely designed ornament demonstrates, not even the world’s jolliest man will be safe from the impending zombie apocalypse.

Diamonds are rare, but not compared to meteorite or dinosaur bone. When you’re really looking to impress your significant other, nothing will demonstrate your love and commitment quite like the meteorite and dinosaur bone ring.

Wish your fellow geeky friends and family an out of this world holiday season with the Star Wars holiday cards. Each card contains one of your favorite characters such as Lando or Yoda dressed in full Christmas garments, wishing you a Merry Christmas in their own special way.

The Super Nintendo cartridge soap is a great way to stay clean while complementing your gaming lifestyle. These brilliantly designed soaps are life-size replicas of the Super NES cartridges and feature some of the classic titles such as DK Country and Super Mario Kart.

Decorate the Christmas tree with these 8-bit pixelated ornaments. Each one of these hand made ornament sets includes four 8-bit pixel art Christmas baubles. They measure between 3-4 inches, and include ornament hooks so you can hang them from your Christmas tree.

Pokemon panties. PO-KE-MON PANTIES. Let that sink in. These cute and comfy panties are designed like some of the most popular Pokemon characters – allowing you to transform your rear end into that of your favorite Pokemon.

The Super Mario World belt is geek chic at it’s best. This custom made belt sports an eye-catching flying Mario buckle, complemented by a tanned leather belt designed to look like an actual level from the classic Nintendo game. It’s the ultimate gift for the fashionable geek.

Enjoy the company of the nation’s most beloved newscaster during playtime with the Ron Burgundy LEGO. This dashing LEGO Burgundy sports his iconic mustache and comes dressed in a suit so fine it makes Sinatra look like a hobo – now to find some LEGO scotch.

Get ready to cast lightning bolts and fireballs at mighty foes while suited up in this epic battle mage armor. Hand crafted from premium 10oz leather, the strap and buckle closing outfit can be custom built to any color and size measurements requested.

Ward off ghouls, boogie men, and even Bowser himself with the Super Mario night light. This cleverly designed night light is stylish, durable, and made in the likeness of our favorite Italian plumber – making it a great accent light for any young gamer’s bedroom.

Stay warm and healthy like a true fan with the Chicago Bulls flu game socks. They’re an ode to the great Michael Jordan and capture the iconic image of Jordan hugging Scottie Pippen after the historic game against the Utah Jazz during the ’97 playoffs.

Solve the mystery of the promised cake with this solvable Portal Companion Cube themed Rubik’s Cube. Available in either the original Portal 1 Companion Cube or Portal 2 Companion Cube style, this geeky Rubik’s Cube is a must have for gamers.

Dress up like your friendly neighborhood web-slinger while you keep warm with the Spider Man beanie. This custom knit beanie doubles as a fashionable garment and mask you can actully see through – just pull the beanie down over your eyes to become Spider Man.

The sleeping mushroom fairy princess is the perfect accent for any little girls room. This tiny mushroom fairy is hand made and intricately decorated right down to the smallest detail. Your little princess will fall in love with it almost immediately.

If your furry friend isn’t so quite so furry, the dog winter suit will help maintain them warmer than a husky. The velour fleece winter suit is available in various colors and styles and is custom made to the measurements of your pooch to ensure a perfect fit.

Disturb your friends and family with this temporary tattoo that creates the mortifying illusion that a family of spiders are crawling on your skin. Available in a package of 5 creepy spiders, these temporary tattoos will last up to a week on your body.

Keep your feline friend entertained for hours on end with the Super Mario cat complex. Great for all gamers and cat lovers, this novelty item comes complete with a question box and green portals lined with sisal to help them climb in and out of the box.

Master artist Dave Pollot has a unique skill set – he finds abandoned art from thrift shops and re-paints them to look more captivating. Each work of art is a limited piece, featuring geeky additions such as Futurama and Star Wars characters.

Unleash the dragonborn warrior within with this life size Skyrim Dovahkiin iron helmet. Based on the iconic iron helmet commonly found in the video game, this highly detailed replica helmet is an absolute must have for The Elder Scrolls: Skyrim fans.

Add a touch of French-inspired fashion to any outfit with the guillotine necklace. This finely crafted necklace features a completely 3D guillotine pendant made from white bronze and accented with an oxidized sterling silver overlay to bring out the intricacies of the wood.

The Doctor Who Dalek glass pipe will take you on a mind expanding journey no TARDIS ride can match. This custom made gem delivers a concentrated dose of THC to your body with the same efficiency they shoot their death ray with – EXTERMINATE.

Solidify your relationship with your BFF with the Breaking Bad friendship necklace. These chemically pure and stable necklace pendants are perfect for those unlikely friendships we all come upon in our lives, or just for drug dealers. Friendship, bitch!

Flaunt it if you’ve got it with the ass cleavage underwear. Deemed too sexy for traditional stores such as Victoria’s Secret, this revealing pair of underwear will highlight your best asset, and also makes squeezing out a chocolate hot dog a much simpler and faster process.

Start your day off like a true gamer by showering with the NES controller soap bar. This delightfully scented bar of soap is styled exactly like the classic NES controllers we all grew up on – right down to the tiniest detail. A must have for any gamer’s bathroom.

titleEN: Han Solo Frozen In Carbonite Ring
content: Carry one of the greatest scenes in cinematic history wherever you go with the Han Solo frozen in carbonite ring. This limited edition ring depicts the heroic Captain Han Solo after he was captured and trapped in carbonite. A great piece of flair for any Star Wars fan.

Experience what it’s like to get cuffed without having to actually get arrested by accessorizing your outfit with the handcuff ring. The ring is made from steel titanium and is designed like an exact replica of  a real handcuff. It even includes a functioning lock and key.

It’s dangerous to go alone – take this Triforce bra! Inspired by the iconic Legend of Zelda franchise, this hand painted bra features the bold styling of the Triforce design on an eye catching royal blue backdrop that every princess will be dying to wear.

The Nintendo controller iPhone charger has old and new technology teaming up to aid you on your daily activities. The charger is made from an authentic NES controller and provides an amusing way for all gamers to charge their iPhones.

Style yourself with jewelry inspired by one of the most infamous intergalatic bounty hunters from a galaxy far, far away. The ring is crafted in the likeness of the iconic helmet worn by Boba Fett, and is available in an affordable sterling silver or eye catching platinum.

Dr. Heiter is at it again, creating yet another masterpiece of digestive efficiency with the my little pony centipede. This horrifically detailed doll depicts three little ponies surgically bound together from ass to mouth so the excrement of one is the food of another.

Look sexy like a fox with this foxy underwear. These custom made cotton undies are as adorable and unique as they are comfy. Each pair features a cute little maroon and white fox complete with hand sewn facial features and two little fox ears to complete the look.

The countless hours you spent wrangling up stray Pokemon on your Game Boy would mean nothing without the Pokemon trainer badges. These custom made badges are the ideal way to validate your long and arduous journey to becoming a true Pokemon master.

The Breaking Bad Heisenberg cufflinks are just like Walt – understated yet imposing. These handmade cufflinks are made in his likeness and display his signature pork-pie hat and sunglasses. A great piece of flair for all Breaking Bad fans.

Give your offspring an out of this world gift with the Transformers Optimus Prime plushie. This soft and cuddly Transformer is made from felt in the likeness of the great and powerful leader of the Autobots – Optimus Prime. It makes a great gift for fans of the classic cartoon.

Welcome, all guests are, when you place the Yoda welcome doormat by the front door. This clever doormat displays Yoda’s portrait over a short welcome message all guests – especially Star Wars fans – will enjoy. It’s the ideal house warming gift for any Sci-Fi fan.

Take your favorite band of talking toys along wherever you go with the Toy Story shoes. These classic slip-on Vans feature a custom graphic of Woody, Buzz, Rex and the rest of the gang drawn in amazing detail. You definitely have a friend in these shoes.

The Donkey Kong blanket is a handcrafted rendition of the original video game released in 1981. Every ladder, barrel, and even Mr. Kong himself are knitted from acrylic thread so you can stay warm during the winter months while reminiscing about this classic game.

Protect yourself from possible Predators with the Xenomorph brass knuckles ring. This fierce piece of jewelry doubles as a stylish fashion accessory and self defense weapon. The Xenomorph ring stretches out and instantly transforms into deadly brass knuckles.

Hey girl, if you want to see Ryan Gosling’s perfect face everyday then you need to buy yourself a pair of these stud earrings. With two times the Gosling, you’ll be getting a double stuff of the most handsome man on the planet that will have you smiling from ear to ear.

Look no further than the Super Mario piranha sculptures to add the perfect touch to any gamer’s bedroom. These hand sculpted works of art portray the deadly piranha plants from the classic Mario Bros. game in stunning detail – a great gift for any old school gamer.

Count on the bleeding hand candle to lend a helpful yet eerily disturbing hand next time the power goes out. This unique candle comes shaped like a dismembered hand and creates the illusion it’s bleeding out once the red wax on the interior of the candle begins to melt.

Restore yourself to full health points and full hygiene points simultaneously with the Zelda heart shaped soap bar. Featuring a suspended cherry center and a translucent light blue outer shell, the Zelda themed heart soap bar is the perfect gift idea for smelly gamers.

Look like a reading aficionado while you get drunk off your ass with the hollow book and flask. This dynamic duo makes you appreciate classic literature like never before. The book conceals a hollowed out interior shaped to perfectly cradle a nice full flask of hard liquor.

Power up your afternoon meals by encasing them inside a recycled NES lunchbox. This one of a kind lunchbox is made from a re-purposed original Nintendo console and features a high quality handle to accent the look. Your young gamer will be the envy of every kid at school.

Just in time for All Hallows Eve comes Halloweenstown’s hottest import – the Nightmare Before Christmas Sally ragdoll dress. With custom stitching and vibrant colors, this hand made dress is designed to look like the dress Sally wore in the film.

Cuddle up to the sea’s most friendly and lovable monster with the giant Cthulu plushie and experience the warm embrace as its nine ancient tentacles hug you tightly while the dark lord whispers sweet nothings of a language long forgotten to lull you to sleep.

This is no Jedi mind trick, these truly are the double droids you’re looking for. The hand painted R2-D2 bra converts your boring biological breasts into mechanical wonders of engineering that will have every intergalactic space criminal drooling over them.

Stay warm while you study for the big biology test with the body anatomy sweatshirt. This stylish pink sweatshirt features a stitched on textbook-like graphic mapping out the human body’s internal organs – it’s educational fashion at its best.

The Nightmare Before Christmas bottle makes the ideal accessory for any geeky outfit. This handmade pendant creates a surreal landscape inspired by the singular visual style of director Tim Burton. It’s a pendant with artwork as unique as the director himself.

No sexy nurse, fairy, or butterfly costume would be complete without the maggot infested throat necklace. This graphic and revolting costume prop will have all others staring in astonishment and disgust as plump maggots spew out of your festering open wound.

Bring a little Jedi zen into your life with the Master Yoda terrarium. This terrarium will sit perfectly on your porch or in your kitchen to give you a little bit of the spiritual Yoda guidance you’ve been seeking all your life. An eco-friendly moss terrarium it is!

Show off that award winning smile wherever you go by accessorizing with the denture bracelet. This unique and hand made bracelet showcases two rows of pearly whites that have been shined to a nice glossy finish. They’re perfect for complementing any outfit.

Add some life to any dull story by saving your place with the cabaret legs bookmark. Sporting a pair of sexy black heels, these sultry stems will have you turning off the tv and reaching for the <del> woman trapped inside</del> thrilling story you’re currently reading.

The bloody cleaver ring is just the accessory you’ll need to put the finishing touches on any Halloween costume this Fall. While worn, the bloody cleaver ring creates the illusion your fingers are being brutally chopped off by a razor sharp cleaver.

Don’t get lost in the treacherous land of <del>vagina</del> Hyrule – simply look at your underwear for guidance with these Zelda panties. These geeky panties feature an elastic waistband for your comfort, and can be custom ordered with specific areas from the Link’s Awakening map.

Mirror mirror on the wall, who’s the fastest ship of them all? Why, the Millennium Falcon of course! Each one of these geeky Millennium Falcon mirrors are hand-made and hand-painted, and make an excellent gift for the Star Wars fan who appreciates fine craftsmanship.

The Empire Strikes Book with this Imperial AT-AT bookcase. This hand-made piece is a must have collectible for Star Wars fans – and is perfect for displaying your books and memorabilia in geeky fashion.

Kevin Flynn has become one with the system now that his portrait has been etched on this TRON themed circuit board. This artistic circuit board displays the message “Flynn lives” right under his portrait – a must have for any TRON fan and/or sci-fi enthusiast.

Pay tribute to America’s most bad-ass President with the historically accurate Roosevelt vs. Bigfoot painting. This glorious painting depicts Teddy Roosevelt gunning down the mighty Big Foot as he cleared the way for the construction of the Panama canal.

Turn those pesky invading sea tentacles into helpful storage devices with the tentacle wall hanger. Perfect for organizing your stuff, the tentacle wall hanger’s multiple curved arms easily handle keys, necklaces, rings, or just about anything you can hang.

Play a game of Simon anytime and anywhere with this functional Simon belt buckle. This classic game of memory testing will now not only provide you with hours of portable entertainment, but it will also add a splash of nostalgia to your wardrobe.

Add to your collection of bottled Poe souls without ever having to battle Poe himself with these mini glow in the dark necklaces. Available in a variety of colors, each bottled Poe soul is hand painted and fixed in place with a transparent gel.

Protect the weakest point of entry – the glass window – with one of the most decorated heroes of our generation with the Halo Master Chief. This handmade masterpiece features the legendary Master Chief standing guard, crafted out of roughly 200 pieces of glass.

Never before has a plump patty, lettuce, and pickles looked more appealing than on the cheeseburger pillow. Made from recycled fabrics, this loaded pillow comes with all the fixings and condiments you’ll need to relax as you lay down on the soft buns.

Sometimes you just don’t feel like doing anything at work or school. For those days that seems to drag on endlessly, try using a “fuck this shit’ pencil. Each pencil displays a short and friendly message to communicate to the rest of the world just how much you want to be there.

Flair up your home like any respected environmental friendly Pokemon master would with a few of the wood burned Pokeballs. Although they’re not designed to capture real life Pokemon, they’re great for adding a touch of rustic elegance to the room.

Give new life to your significant other when you bestow upon them the most revitalizing gift in all of Hyrule, the Zelda heart shaped pendant. This hand crafted pendant displays a lovely crimson heart encased in a bright field of blue – a must have for those looking to boost their HP.

Before the Dark Knight donned his high tech suit, a great ancestor of his battled dragons and wizards in the medieval Batman armor. The custom designed bat helmet is complimented by a full suit of armor that includes a metallic Batman logo emblazoned over the front.

Keep your humble abode looking classy with the Alien facehugger wall clock hanging on the wall. This eye catching clock displays a copper toned facehugger latching onto a large black plate, while each conveniently placed arm helps point out the time.

There’s no better symbol of friendship in the entire galaxy than the C-3PO R2D2 heart necklace. You and your BFF will each get to take one half of the dynamic robot duo that when joined together, form a cool and geeky heart shape.

There’s no better knick-knack for your burgeoning collection of fourth dimensional objects than the world’s smallest Klein bottle. This self contained bottle is approximately 1 1/4″ tall and hand blown by an expert artisan out of a durable borosilicate glass.

Easily switch to the Dark Side when you install one of these Star Wars Alliances themed light switches in your home. With the flick of the switch you can join an elite group of galaxy peacekeepers, or succumb to the temptations of the Dark Side as night falls.

Nothing will keep those unwanted visitors away from your home quite like the go away bite mark doormat. If the straight forward message isn’t enough to deter guests from your humble abode, the fierce bite mark will get the message across loud and clear.

Dress up as Arkham Asylum’s most dedicated and professional psychiatrist with the Harley Quinn costume. This hand crafted costume features intricate detailing and a vibrant contrast of colors guaranteed to make you the center of attention anywhere you wear it.

Add a little macabre decor to your home with the  skull sculpture. This custom-made sculpture displays a unique pattern, which gives a 360 degree view of the skull inside and out so you get to appreciate its intricate detailing. It also makes a great Halloween time decoration.

Count your blessings and say your prayers with these Star Wars prayer candles. Whether you wish to pray to the Dark Side or whisper sweet nothings to the Queen of the Rebel scum, there is truly a prayer candle for every type of blasphemous Star Wars geek out there.
